verses.verse: "Beware <S%G4337><s%> of practicing <S%G4160><s%> your righteousness <S%G1343><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> men <S%G444><s%> to be noticed <S%G2300><s%> by them; otherwise <S%G7507><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> reward <S%G3408><s%> with your Father <S%G3962><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> is in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

"When <S%G3752><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> you give <S%G4160><s%> alms, <S%G1654><s%> do not sound <S%G4537><s%> a trumpet <S%G4537><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> you, as the hypocrites <S%G5273><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> in the synagogues <S%G4864><s%> and in the streets, <S%G4505><s%> that they may be honored <S%G1392><s%> by men. <S%G444><s%> Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, they have <S%G568><s%> their reward <S%G3408><s%> in full. <S%G568><s%>

"But when you give <S%G4160><s%> alms, <S%G1654><s%> do not let your left <S%G710><s%> hand <S%G710><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> your right <S%G1188><s%> hand <S%G1188><s%> is doing <S%G4160><s%>
that your alms <S%G1654><s%> may be in secret; <S%G2927><s%> and your Father <S%G3962><s%> who sees <S%G991><s%> in secret <S%G2927><s%> will repay <S%G591><s%> you.

"And when <S%G3752><s%> you pray, <S%G4336><s%> you are not to be as the hypocrites; <S%G5273><s%> for they love <S%G5368><s%> to stand <S%G2476><s%> and pray <S%G4336><s%> in the synagogues <S%G4864><s%> and on the street <S%G4116><s%> corners, <S%G1137><s%> in order <S%G3704><s%> to be seen <S%G5316><s%> by men. <S%G444><s%> Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, they have <S%G568><s%> their reward <S%G3408><s%> in full. <S%G568><s%>

"But you, when <S%G3752><s%> you pray, <S%G4336><s%> go <S%G1525><s%> into your inner <S%G5009><s%> room, <S%G5009><s%> and when you have shut <S%G2808><s%> your door, <S%G2374><s%> pray <S%G4336><s%> to your Father <S%G3962><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> is in secret, <S%G2927><s%> and your Father <S%G3962><s%> who sees <S%G991><s%> in secret <S%G2927><s%> will repay <S%G591><s%> you.

"And when you are praying, <S%G4336><s%> do not use <S%G945><s%> meaningless <S%G945><s%> repetition, <S%G945><s%> as the Gentiles <S%G1482><s%> do, for they suppose <S%G1380><s%> that they will be heard <S%G1522><s%> for their many <S%G4180><s%> words. <S%G4180><s%>
"Therefore <S%G3767><s%> do not be like <S%G3666><s%> them; for your Father <S%G3962><s%> knows <S%G3609><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> you need, <S%G5532><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> you ask <S%G154><s%> Him.

"Pray, <S%G4336><s%> then, <S%G3767><s%> in this <S%G3779><s%> way: <S%G3779><s%> 'Our Father <S%G3962><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> art in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> Hallowed <S%G37><s%> be Thy name. <S%G3686><s%>
'Thy kingdom <S%G932><s%> come. <S%G2064><s%> Thy will <S%G2307><s%> be done, <S%G1096><s%> On earth <S%G1093><s%> as it is in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>
'Give <S%G1325><s%> us this <S%G4594><s%> day <S%G4594><s%> our daily <S%G1967><s%> bread. <S%G740><s%>
'And forgive <S%G863><s%> us our debts, <S%G3783><s%> as we also <S%G2532><s%> have forgiven <S%G863><s%> our debtors. <S%G3781><s%>

'And do not lead <S%G1533><s%> us into temptation, <S%G3986><s%> but deliver <S%G4506><s%> us from evil. <S%G4190><s%> [For Thine <S%G4771><s%> is the kingdom, <S%G932><s%> and the power, <S%G1411><s%> and the glory, <S%G1391><s%> forever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>]'

"For if <S%G1437><s%> you forgive <S%G863><s%> men <S%G444><s%> for their transgressions, <S%G3900><s%> your heavenly <S%G3770><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> will also <S%G2532><s%> forgive <S%G863><s%> you.
"But if <S%G1437><s%> you do not forgive <S%G863><s%> men, <S%G444><s%> then <S%G3761><s%> your Father <S%G3962><s%> will not forgive <S%G863><s%> your transgressions. <S%G3900><s%>

"And whenever <S%G3752><s%> you fast, <S%G3522><s%> do not put <S%G1096><s%> on a gloomy <S%G4659><s%> face <S%G4659><s%> as the hypocrites <S%G5273><s%> [do,] for they neglect <S%G853><s%> their appearance <S%G4383><s%> in order <S%G3704><s%> to be seen <S%G5316><s%> fasting <S%G3522><s%> by men. <S%G444><s%> Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, they have <S%G568><s%> their reward <S%G3408><s%> in full. <S%G568><s%>
"But you, when you fast, <S%G3522><s%> anoint <S%G218><s%> your head, <S%G2776><s%> and wash <S%G3538><s%> your face <S%G4383><s%>

so <S%G3704><s%> that you may not be seen <S%G5316><s%> fasting <S%G3522><s%> by men, <S%G444><s%> but by your Father <S%G3962><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> is in secret; <S%G2931><s%> and your Father <S%G3962><s%> who sees <S%G991><s%> in secret <S%G2931><s%> will repay <S%G591><s%> you.

"Do not lay <S%G2343><s%> up for yourselves <S%G4771><s%> treasures <S%G2344><s%> upon earth, <S%G1093><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> moth <S%G4597><s%> and rust <S%G1035><s%> destroy, <S%G853><s%> and where <S%G3699><s%> thieves <S%G2812><s%> break <S%G1358><s%> in and steal. <S%G2813><s%>

"But lay <S%G2343><s%> up for yourselves <S%G4771><s%> treasures <S%G2344><s%> in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> moth <S%G4597><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> rust <S%G1035><s%> destroys, <S%G853><s%> and where <S%G3699><s%> thieves <S%G2812><s%> do not break <S%G1358><s%> in or <S%G3761><s%> steal; <S%G2813><s%>
for where <S%G3699><s%> your treasure <S%G2344><s%> is, there <S%G1563><s%> will your heart <S%G2588><s%> be also. <S%G2532><s%>

"The lamp <S%G3088><s%> of the body <S%G4983><s%> is the eye; <S%G3788><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> your eye <S%G3788><s%> is clear, <S%G573><s%> your whole <S%G3650><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> will be full <S%G5460><s%> of light. <S%G5460><s%>

"But if <S%G1437><s%> your eye <S%G3788><s%> is bad, <S%G4190><s%> your whole <S%G3650><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> will be full <S%G4652><s%> of darkness. <S%G4652><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> the light <S%G5457><s%> that is in you is darkness, <S%G4655><s%> how <S%G4214><s%> great <S%G4214><s%> is the darkness! <S%G4655><s%>

"No <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> serve <S%G1398><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> masters; <S%G2962><s%> for either <S%G2228><s%> he will hate <S%G3404><s%> the one <S%G1520><s%> and love <S%G25><s%> the other, <S%G2087><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> he will hold <S%G472><s%> to one <S%G1520><s%> and despise <S%G2706><s%> the other. <S%G2087><s%> You cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> serve <S%G1398><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> and mammon. <S%G3126><s%>

"For this <S%G3778><s%> reason <S%G1223><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, do not be anxious <S%G3309><s%> for your life, <S%G5590><s%> [as to] what <S%G5101><s%> you shall eat, <S%G2068><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> you shall drink; <S%G4095><s%> nor <S%G3366><s%> for your body, <S%G4983><s%> [as to] what <S%G5101><s%> you shall put <S%G1746><s%> on. Is not life <S%G5590><s%> more <S%G4183><s%> than food, <S%G5160><s%> and the body <S%G4983><s%> than clothing <S%G1742><s%>?

"Look <S%G1689><s%> at the birds <S%G4071><s%> of the air, <S%G3772><s%> that they do not sow, <S%G4687><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> do they reap, <S%G2325><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> gather <S%G4863><s%> into barns, <S%G596><s%> and [yet] your heavenly <S%G3770><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> feeds <S%G5142><s%> them. Are you not worth <S%G1308><s%> much <S%G3123><s%> more <S%G1308><s%> than they?
"And which <S%G5101><s%> of you by being anxious <S%G3309><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> add <S%G4369><s%> a [single] cubit <S%G4083><s%> to his life's span <S%G2244><s%>?

"And why <S%G5101><s%> are you anxious <S%G3309><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> clothing <S%G1742><s%>? Observe <S%G2648><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> the lilies <S%G2918><s%> of the field <S%G68><s%> grow; <S%G837><s%> they do not toil <S%G2872><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> do they spin, <S%G3514><s%>

yet <S%G1161><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you that even <S%G3761><s%> Solomon <S%G4672><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> his glory <S%G1391><s%> did not clothe <S%G4016><s%> himself like <S%G5613><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of these. <S%G3778><s%>

"But if <S%G1487><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> arrays <S%G294><s%> the grass <S%G5528><s%> of the field, <S%G68><s%> which is [alive] today <S%G4594><s%> and tomorrow <S%G839><s%> is thrown <S%G906><s%> into the furnace, <S%G2823><s%> [will He] not much <S%G4183><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> [do so for] you, O men <S%G3640><s%> of little <S%G3640><s%> faith <S%G3640><s%>?

"Do not be anxious <S%G3309><s%> then, <S%G3767><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> 'What <S%G5101><s%> shall we eat <S%G2068><s%>?' or <S%G2228><s%> 'What <S%G5101><s%> shall we drink <S%G4095><s%>?' or <S%G2228><s%> 'With what <S%G5101><s%> shall we clothe <S%G4016><s%> ourselves?'

"For all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> eagerly <S%G1934><s%> seek; <S%G1934><s%> for your heavenly <S%G3770><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> knows <S%G3609><s%> that you need <S%G5535><s%> all <S%G537><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things. <S%G3778><s%>

"But seek <S%G2212><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> His kingdom <S%G932><s%> and His righteousness; <S%G1343><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> shall be added <S%G4369><s%> to you.

"Therefore <S%G3767><s%> do not be anxious <S%G3309><s%> for tomorrow; <S%G839><s%> for tomorrow <S%G839><s%> will care <S%G3309><s%> for itself. <S%G1438><s%> [Each] day <S%G2250><s%> has enough <S%G713><s%> trouble <S%G2549><s%> of its own.
